scripts.start: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "HTTP,JS,SCSS" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run http-server" "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-styles"
scripts.watch-styles: npm run build-styles-dev && chokidar "**/*.scss" -c "npm run build-styles-dev"
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-styles
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify ./js/lib/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t envify -o ./js/app.js && npm run minify-js
scripts.build-styles: npm run build-scss && npm run postcss && npm run minify-css
scripts.build-styles-dev: npm run build-scss && npm run postcss && echo "Styles built!"
